mapper.insert: insert into runnings(userno, runningdate, runningcity, region, runningtime, meetingpoint, type, joinednum, runmaxnum, name, crewno, ownerno, status) values(#{userno}, #{runningdate}, #{runningcity}, #{region}, #{runningtime}, #{meetingpoint}, #{type}, #{joinednum}, #{runmaxnum}, #{name}, #{crewno}, #{ownerno}, #{status})
mapper.update:
update runnings
name = #{name},
runningdate = #{runningdate},
runningcity = #{runningcity},
region = #{region},
meetingpoint = #{meetingpoint},
runningtime = #{runningtime},
type = #{type},
runmaxnum = #{runmaxnum},
where no = #{no}
